Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Feels good standing on the bow, doesn't it? I'm not feeling any wind, though. Can we get the captain to speed the ship up a little bit?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...I'm swinging.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'By the way, I\'ve heard of a thing called "figurehead" that\'s installed at the bow. Should we get one for this ship? I know a guy who can give you a twenty percent discount.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...I'm swinging.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Can't you two behave?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Apart from the staff, three other Constructs are also present on the bridge of the Nighter. On one side are the two guests from Akdilek.'}
{3: 'On the other side is Pulao, acting as a host from the ship.'}

{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Sophia, get down from the fence! We have a telescope for observation purposes, so stop doing it with your eyes! We'll have to stop the ship to save you if you fall into the sea!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "And Changyu, stop tricking my people and have them sign your contracts! I'm not putting a weird statue in front of my ship!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Sigh, what a killjoy.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The two return to the deck at Pulao's insistence, then they stare at her with a gaze that suggests she will need to offer some kind of alternative entertainment."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I finally understand how hard it is to babysit children...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "You aren't that old yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'If only Nanami were here. That would make four of us in the baby squad.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'm not joining any baby squad!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Ugh, why do I need to do this?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Because the Nighter signed a Sea Freight contract with Akdilek, duh.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "And we're the guards of the cargo.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I haven't seen you two doing any guarding...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Enough with this. Are you ready to do the call?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Did you just... change the subject out of nowhere?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Let's head to the comms room.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Hey, we're not moving on from our discussion yet! We're going to make some rules regarding your time on the Nighter!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao draws her weapon and blocks the two of them from running away, her deadly gaze declaring how serious she is about making rules.'}
{3: 'Confronted by her this way, Changyu and Sophia do not show any sense of uneasiness and stress. Instead, they stare back with great puzzlement.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Eh... No one likes that kind of attitude, Pulao.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "You don't get to judge me!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Jamilah once told me a saying that goes, "carpe diem, seize the drink!" I happen to have a fancy bottle with me. Please seize it and pretend nothing\'s happened.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "That's not how the saying goes...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Still, Pulao takes the weird-looking bottle Sophia has hidden behind her despite complaining. She takes a large sip.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'This is seawater!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'You just smashed the bottle on the ground...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You tricked me! That's seawater!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I said it was a fancy bottle, not a fancy drink... Anyway, it'll cost you 250, and no refund, because you broke the bottle.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: '250? What kind of devil are you?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Absolutely defeated, Pulao falls to her knees, her face filled with loathing.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Sob... I said I couldn't handle the two of them... When are the rest of the Kowloong Crew coming back... Sob...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Hmm. You might have overdone it, Sophia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'It seems so. Sorry, Pulao, we were just playing with you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'We\'ll sort out your rules and our business on the Nighter together later. Now, take this candy, and come with us to make "the call"!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Ah... Okay, you're right. We should do that quickly while we're still connected.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She unwraps the candy and swallows it. Pulao is about to lead the two Akdilek Constructs to the comms room when they each grab one of her shoulders.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia & Changyu', 3: 'The candy will cost you 250.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
